reviewText: Was not able to watch this move on my t v.  It's from uk.
I do not think they made it clear this was a dvd that could not play here in America.  I think that should be in large print somewhere.  Oh well live and learn.
Doesn't play on the USA DVD players. The reading coming up error on the DVD players in the USA, it will not play and the DVD case says universal.
Thank u this was a great but n my kids will love it. Peppa pig is hard to find. :)
I was have happy with the quality of this dvd. The kids love it. I would definently recommend buying this item. Very fast shipping!
Well, the problem I guess could have been my fault.  This DVD does not work here in the USA.  Wrong settings.  So, my granddaughter was very upset with me.  We could not view the video.
This movie came quickly and in great condition. My daughter will be so excited to have this in our DVD collection. No more worrying about recording episodes!
Did Not Play.... Had to return to Vendor !!!
